name: Cornucopia (mpalad2)
description: Cornucopia is a dating sim in which the player finds themselves transported to a completely different world. And they couldn’t have come at a worse time - the kingdom of Cornucopia has entered a new age of ruling between locusts and corns, but tensions are high. It is up to the player and their new Cornucopian allies to bring peace to the world. The player must forge new bonds and adapt quickly to their new environment if they ever hope to return to their world!
